    • setGhostItem

      void setGhostItem(ItemSlot slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, @Nullable org.bukkit.entity.Player... players)
      Ignores NPC's equipment and sends a "ghost" item to provided players. HumanNPC.updateEquipment(Player...) will reset NPC's "ghost" equipment.
      Parameters:
      slot - - Slot to put items on.
      item - - Item.
      players - - Players who will see the change.

      Parameters:

      item - - Item.
      players - - Players who will see the change.

    • show

      void show(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player... players)
      Shows this NPC to players. Players provided via this arguments are saved and used for further use in method annotated with InsuredViewers
      Parameters:
      players - - Players who NPC will be shown to.
